## New service metadata: 
{
"title": "",
"url": "",
"description": "",
"keywords": ["",""],
"img_url": "",
"access_rights": "",
"class": ""
}

Permitted values for some elements: 
access_rights: Open, Restricted 
class: Service, Tool, Product, Document
